channel.title: U.S. Police Shooting News Tracker
channel.description: Automated news aggregation tracking police-involved shootings in the United States

item.title: Greg Bovino Isn’t Losing Job Despite Report Suggesting Otherwise, DHS Says
item.description: Bovino participated in federal operations in Minnesota after an ICE agent fatally shot Renee Good earlier this month.

item.title: Trump touts ‘progress’ in Minneapolis after ‘very good’ call with Mayor Jacob Frey
item.description: The call came after a second US citizen was fatally shot by federal agents in Minneapolis this month.

item.title: Knife-wielding nut allegedly asked Christian his religion – then stabbed him and dog before police shot him
item.description: Armed Washington suspect died after police shooting following alleged stabbing attack on man and dog that occurred after asking victim about Christian faith in Parkland on Sunday.

item.title: Border Patrol Commander Gregory Bovino Will Leave Minnesota Amid Persistent Protests
item.description: Protests are continuing in the state after an ICE agent fatally shot 37-year-old Alex Pretti on Saturday.

item.title: Fury as Border Patrol boss flees Minneapolis after nurse's killing: 'So it's about PR'
item.description: News that Customs and Border Patrol commander Greg Bovino will depart Minneapolis after an immigration agent shot and killed an ICU nurse over the weekend sparked outrage online. CNN's Kaitlan Collins, Priscilla Alvarez, and Kristen Holmes reported on Monday …

item.title: Border Patrol chief Greg Bovino, some agents pull out of Minneapolis in wake of Alex Pretti shooting
item.description: The US Border Patrol's chief Greg Bovino and some agents have been ordered out of Minneapolis in a stunning turnaround after a second US citizen was killed by federal agents in the city this month, according to reports.

item.title: A second U.S. citizen was killed by federal forces in Minneapolis. Here's what we know
item.description: The fatal shooting of Alex Pretti, the second U.S. citizen to be killed by federal forces in Minnesota this month, has intensified the public outrage over tactics used by immigration agents in the state and united unlikely bedfellows in calling for a full inv…

item.title: Trump could rein in ICE operation as shooting outrage intensifies
item.description: The Trump administration indicates it could rein in its Minnesota immigration crackdown as public outrage intensifies after a federal agent killed a protester.

item.title: Immigration officers fear Trump just doomed their jobs: 'We lost all trust'
item.description: Current and former immigration officers spoke out against President Donald Trump's crackdown in Minnesota Monday.A Customs and Border Patrol agent shot and killed 37-year-old Alex Pretti over the weekend, less than three weeks after a veteran Immigration and …

item.title: Republicans You’d Never Expect Are Criticizing Minneapolis Shooting
item.description: After a Border Patrol agent shot and killed nurse Alex Pretti, 37, in Minneapolis over the weekend, some Republicans are beginning to speak out against the Trump administration’s actions.“ICE agents do not have carte blanche in carrying out their duties,” Ala…

item.title: Minneapolis shooting: NRA stress right to carry guns after fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by federal agents
item.description: The NRA criticised comments made by a senior federal prosecutor, saying it was “dangerous and wrong” to suggest that people who legally carry guns risk being shot by police.

item.title: ‘Sickening lies’: Parents of man killed by federal agent in Minneapolis go nuclear on Trump’s ‘murdering thugs’
item.description: 'I do not throw around the hero term lightly. However his last thought and act was to protect a woman'

item.title: GOP Sen. Cassidy breaks with Trump over deadly shooting by Border Patrol agent in Minneapolis
item.description: Republican Sen. Bill Cassidy calls for full investigation after a Border Patrol agent shot and killed a man in Minneapolis during a DHS operation on Saturday.

item.title: Pritzker urges 'unified response' from Democrat, Republican governors after Border Patrol shoots armed man
item.description: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker and New York Gov. Kathy Hochul slammed thee Trump administration after Border Patrol shot an armed man in Minneapolis.

item.title: Man injured in southern Colorado police chase, shooting
item.description: A Walsenburg police officer shot at a fleeing domestic violence suspect on Wednesday, according to the Colorado Bureau of Investigation.
